sentences.en: I have only a scrappy knowledge of the latest scientific achievements.
sentences.cn: 对于科学的最新成就我只是星星点点知道一些.

sentences.en: It was a scrappy, rambling speech.
sentences.cn: 那篇讲话杂乱无章, 毫无条理.

sentences.en: People made jokes about our cold house, about our scrappy little farm and our rough life.
sentences.cn: 他们常拿这冰冷的房子 、 杂乱的小农场和艰难的生活来和我们开玩笑.

sentences.en: Scrappy remembrances passed across her mind.
sentences.cn: 往事的片断在她脑海中闪过.

sentences.en: The final chapter is no more than a scrappy addition.
sentences.cn: 最后一章不过是一些支离破碎的补充内容。

sentences.en: The note was written on a scrappy bit of paper.

sentences.cn: 这篇报告有一点杂乱无章.

sentences.en: Though scrappy, not systematic, it had developed into the height of the theory.
sentences.cn: 虽然零碎, 不成系统, 却初步形成、发展到了理论的高度.

sentences.en: You're also so generous and kind and scrappy!
sentences.cn: 你现在还很慷慨,善良,斗志旺盛!

words.tran_cn: 爱打架的；杂凑的；不连贯的；生气勃勃的

trans.tran_cn: 混乱的，散乱的，<美>好斗的，好吵架的
